corollaries: A missing context input is a compiler failure, not an execution-time discovery obligation.
Optimizing the innermost loop is primarily optimizing context completeness and correctness.
principles.name: Context is the program
principles.statement: Normative context artifacts are the source program; code and other outputs are compiled artifacts.

principles.name: Machine-native, canonical, validated
principles.statement: Every normative artifact is machine-readable, schema-validated, and canonicalized to stable bytes before it can influence behavior.

principles.name: Patch-first authoring
principles.statement: Machines author changes as small, typed, replay-protected patches; whole-document rewrites are an anti-pattern.

principles.name: Hermetic consumption, bounded production
principles.statement: ZTI applies to context consumption: no discretionary context discovery; production may use tools under explicit leases/budgets with replayable evidence.

principles.name: Evidence is mandatory
principles.statement: Every admission, compilation, export, and gate decision produces evidence stored in CAS and referenced by signed ledger events.

corollaries: No direct edits to generated ABI trees in mainline.
Delivery conformance is tested and versioned via target profiles.
principles.name: Target profiles are the ABI contract
principles.statement: Rendering, retrieval, and delivery are governed by target profiles; vendor or model-specific payloads are deterministic projections, never normative sources.

principles.name: Fail-closed, least privilege, algorithm agility
principles.statement: Parsing, validation, and policy checks fail closed; privileges are explicit; cryptography and serialization choices remain agile under an adversarial threat model.

principles.name: Message-level provenance and replay
principles.statement: All state transitions are represented as signed kernel messages referencing immutable hashes; projections are derived, reconstructable, and auditable.

corollaries: All transitive dependencies are resolved and pinned before consumption.
ContextPack manifests are closure views over the context graph.
principles.name: Context graph closure
principles.statement: Dependencies are explicit and closed; hermetic consumption operates on deep-pinned graph closures, not open-ended discovery.

principles.name: Typed, bounded quantities
principles.statement: Budgets, timeouts, costs, and probabilities use typed quantities with explicit units and enforced bounds to ensure deterministic cross-language behavior.
